text: cold days = studying wrapped up in blankets feels cozy tbh
lol can’t relate, gotta hustle at work rain or shine
definitely feels real managing study deadlines while needing that paycheck 😓
teaching online could work but sounds like everyone's doing that nowadays... feels oversaturated tbh 🤷‍♀️ i did freelance translation - niche market means less competition plus rates are decent!
biz consulting seems lucrative but has high entry barriers - got any tips on breaking into that scene?
juggling part-time job with masters classes teaches you real quick there’s no perfect balance - it's like constantly spinning plates 😓 gotta set your own pace n figure out what works best for you!
turns out i'm always unintentionally organizing everything...even fridge magnets 😂
still got stereotypes at work tho 🙄
yet schools still push old norms 😤
but yeah some fields like politics? slow as snails
seriously tho, student life doesn't get a break 😓
administrative systems can be really baffling too!
sometimes those surprise traditions become fav memories!
nah not really buying into the whole birthplace shaping us talk - feel like we give places too much credit over making our own paths
old city vibes stick yet evolved beyond em
life’s not just math formulas tho
influence exists but doesn't define us entirely
